forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. SW winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. SW winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High around 60F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 65F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
